title: Runelite Plugin Now Available!
leadText: You can now import your tasks, areas, and relics to the website using Runelite!
htmlContent:
You can now import your tasks, areas, and relics to the website using Runelite!

How to use:
  • Install the plugin using the plugin hub
  • Go to the Leagues tab ingame and open/close each interface to make sure your data is up-to-date
  • Click on the OS League Tools icon on the top toolbar to copy your data
  • Open the 'Manage Data' window and paste the copied data in to the 'Runelite Import' tab

title: WEBSITE LAUNCH!
leadText: OS League Tools is officially live!
htmlContent:
OS League Tools is officially live!

I've been working on this site off and on for the past couple of months and I am really hyped to finally get to launch it into beta and share it with all of you. I really hope you'll find it useful.

If you have any site feedback, suggestions, or bug reports, please come by the discord!
